author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-856. cpp: Building cpp library fails on OS X with malloc and free not being declared in scope
This patch adds include which seems to fix the problem for some people.

author: dreiss
msg: In an IDL file, you can can now declare "namespace * foo",
which will apply to any language not explicitly specified.
